meanings.sent1: The inrushes of water flooded the basement after the heavy rain.
meanings.sent2: The inrushes of customers during the sale overwhelmed the store staff.
meanings.sent3: The inrushes of students into the classroom created a chaotic scene.
meanings.sent4: The inrushes of emotions filled her heart with joy.
meanings.sent5: The inrushes of wind through the open window made the curtains dance.

meanings.sent1: The inrushes of people into the stadium caused a commotion.
meanings.sent2: The inrushes of new ideas sparked creativity in the team.
meanings.sent3: The inrushes of laughter from the comedy show echoed in the room.
meanings.sent4: The inrushes of memories flooded her mind when she visited the old house.
meanings.sent5: The inrushes of light through the window brightened up the room.
